info.name: Kiraale Property Platform API
info.description: Complete API collection for Kiraale Property Platform - Property listing and management system

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user account
Login with email and password to get JWT token
Logout user and blacklist the JWT token
Request a password reset email
Reset password using the reset token

item.description: User authentication endpoints - registration, login, logout, password reset

item.name: User Management

request.description: Get all users (requires USER_READ permission)
Get user by ID (requires USER_READ permission)

exec: pm.test("Response contains updated user data", function () {

body.raw:
{
  "firstName": "John Updated",
  "lastName": "Doe Updated",
  "bio": "Updated bio for John Doe - Real Estate Professional",
  "mobile": "+252123456789",
  "address": "Mogadishu, Somalia"
}

request.description: Update user profile (requires USER_WRITE permission)
Change the authenticated user's password
Get current user's properties
Get current user's favorite properties
Add property to favorites
Remove property from favorites
Delete user (requires USER_DELETE permission)

item.description: User management endpoints - CRUD operations for users

item.name: File Uploads

exec: pm.test("Response contains profile picture URL", function () {

request.description: Upload user profile picture to AWS S3 (Max 5MB, Images only)

item.description: File upload endpoints - Profile pictures and media uploads

item.name: Properties

request.description: Get all properties with filtering and pagination (Public endpoint)
Get property by ID (Public endpoint)

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Beautiful 3BR House in Mogadishu",
  "description": "A stunning 3-bedroom house with modern amenities, perfect for families. Located in a secure neighborhood with easy access to schools and shopping centers.",
  "propertyType": "HOUSE",
  "listingType": "SALE",
  "bedrooms": 3,
  "bathrooms": 2,
  "parkingSpaces": 2,
  "landSize": 500.0,
  "floorArea": 250.0,
  "hasAirConditioning": true,
  "address": "Hodan District, Mogadishu",
  "country": "SOMALIA",
  "price": 150000,
  "priceType": "FIXED",
  "availableFrom": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
}

request.description: Create a new property listing (Requires authentication)
Update property (Owner or Admin only)
Soft delete property (Owner or Admin only)
Advanced search properties with comprehensive filtering (Public endpoint)

exec: pm.test("Response contains properties with view counts", function () {

request.description: Get trending properties based on views (Public endpoint)
Manually record a property view (Public endpoint)
Get property analytics and view statistics (Property owner or Admin only)

item.description: Property management endpoints - CRUD operations, search, analytics, and view tracking

item.name: Media Management

request.description: Get media with filtering and pagination (Public endpoint)
Get media by ID (Public endpoint)
Upload property media files to AWS S3 (First upload requires 4+ images, Max 15MB each)
Create media record manually (Property owner or Admin only)
Update media metadata (Property owner or Admin only)
Delete media record only (Property owner or Admin only)
Delete media files from both S3 and database (Property owner or Admin only)

item.description: Media management endpoints - CRUD operations for property media files

item.name: Agency Management

request.description: Get all agencies with pagination (Public endpoint)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Kiraale Properties",
  "description": "Leading real estate agency in Mogadishu",
  "country": "SOMALIA",
  "address": "Hamarweyne District, Mogadishu, Somalia",
  "phone": "+252-1-234567",
  "email": "info@kiraaleproperties.so",
  "website": "https://kiraaleproperties.so",
  "licenseNumber": "REA-2024-001"
}

request.description: Create a new real estate agency (Requires authentication)
Get agency details by ID (Public endpoint)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Kiraale Properties Updated",
  "description": "Updated description for leading real estate agency",
  "address": "Updated address, Mogadishu, Somalia",
  "phone": "+252-1-999999",
  "website": "https://updated-kiraaleproperties.so"
}

request.description: Update agency information (Agency owner/admin only)
Add an agent to the agency (Agency admin only)
Remove an agent from agency (Agency admin only)
Delete agency (Agency owner or admin only)

item.description: Agency management endpoints - Create, read, update, delete agencies and manage agents

item.name: Payment System

request.description: Initiate M-Pesa STK Push payment for property listing (Requires authentication)
Initiate EVC payment for property listing (Requires authentication)
M-Pesa payment callback endpoint (Public webhook endpoint)
Get payment status by checkout request ID (Requires authentication)

item.description: Payment system endpoints - M-Pesa STK Push, EVC payments, callbacks, and status checking

item.name: Service Pricing Management

request.description: Get all active service pricing (Public endpoint)
Get pricing for specific service type (Public endpoint)

body.raw:
{
  "serviceType": "PREMIUM_LISTING",
  "serviceName": "Premium Property Listing",
  "amount": 50,
  "currency": "USD",
  "description": "Premium listing with enhanced visibility and features (amount can be 0 for free promotions)"
}

request.description: Create new service pricing (Admin only)
Update service pricing (Admin only)
Deactivate service pricing (Admin only)

item.description: Service pricing management endpoints - View pricing, admin CRUD operations

item.name: Error Testing

request.description: Test login with invalid credentials
Test registration with duplicate email
Test registration with invalid email format
Test accessing protected route without authentication
Test accessing protected route with invalid JWT token

item.description: Error scenarios and edge cases testing
